name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Backend Developer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications in dynamic environments. Proficient in key technologies such as **Java**, **Kotlin**, and **Spring Framework**, alongside hands-on expertise in **Postgresql** and **MySQL** database management. Solid background in **microservices** architecture and experience with CI/CD processes leveraging **Git** and **Gradle**.

Familiar with agile methodologies, having successfully implemented the **Scrum** framework in previous projects.
Also experienced in the healthcare and financial sectors, with a strong focus on compliance-driven development adhering to industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Committed to maintaining high coding standards and best practices to deliver robust software solutions.
